sec.p: All fieldwork was reviewed and specifically approved by the Ethics Committee of CSIC (ref.: 239/2015), in accordance with the Spanish and EU legislation on the protection of animals used for scientific purposes. Permits to work in the natural protected reserve Chafarinas Archipelago were provided by the Oganismo Autónomo Parques Nacionales (OAPN) and the Ministerio de Agricultura, Pesca y Alimentación of the Spanish Government (ref.: 10022014).
